XNode Class Reference

#include <xnode.h>

Inheritance diagram for XNode:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

XNode supports load/save for scripts/GUI, and signaling among threads.
See also:
create(), createOrphan()

Definition at line 45 of file xnode.h.
